name: Star Hunter (ODONT)
description:
As Marcos, hunt down the meanest Fighters in the universe before they find you, discover where they hide his ultimate Power source. With Dr. Ana's help, get upgrades and new toys from each Star Fighter destroyed.

Destroy every Star Fighter and aid the Empire in STAR HUNTER.

Controls:

Spaceship IA-SH:

"WASD" for moviment, "J" for Shooting, "K" for Special Bomb , "U" and "I" for Speed control (After Core upgrade)

Spaceship OS-00:

Mouse for moviment,  Mouse1 for Shooting, Mouse2 for Special Bomb.
